sensor.name: KeyboardSensor
sensor.description: Provides keyboard and (sketchy) mouse support using ACT-R's keyboard map

property.name: Actuator
property.description: DefaultActuator (or subclasses) combines the interpolated events with the actuator that will actually press buttons or move the mouse.

property.name: DurationEquation
property.description: org.commonreality.sensors.handlers.ICommandTimingEquation used to compute execution times for complex movements

property.name: Speaker
property.description: instance of ISpeaker to do the actual vocalization

property.name: DurationEquation
property.description: org.commonreality.sensors.handlers.ICommandTimingEquation that computes vocalization durations. No value will use default equation

property.name: CharactersPerSecond
property.description: Used by the default duration equation, default 20

property.name: IAuralMutator.
property.description: Impl of GeneralAuralProcessor.IAuralMutator that can tweak aural properties of generated IAfferentObjects

sensor.name: XMLSensor
sensor.description: General sensor that sends sensor data read from an XML file

property.name: XMLSensor.DataURI
property.description: URL or classloader resource that contains the xml formatted data to send
